verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: beat] [ARG1: Hillary Clinton] [ARGM-LOC: in the 2016 presidential election] we all were reminded of how undemocratic the Electoral College is . Clinton received millions more votes and yet the Electoral College showed a very clear victory for ...
